channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Florida and Texas boomtowns are awash in a glut of condos
item.description: It comes down to skyhigh homeowners association fees and insurance costs, according to an analysis from Redfin.

item.title: Friday's jobs report for August is going to be huge. Here's what to expect
item.description: The Wall Street consensus is for nonfarm payrolls growth of 161,000 for August and a slight decline in the unemployment rate to 4.2%.

item.title: GDP data in July made Ireland the envy of Europe. Then came the revision.
The DOJ can’t break up Nvidia party, the stock is staying high, BofA says
item.description: Reports of a possible DOJ inquiry into the chip manufacturer are unlikely to affect the stock—for now.

item.title: Trump adopts Elon Musk plan for government reform, lays out economic plan ahead Harris debate
item.description: Donald Trump is set to debate Kamala Harris on ABC News on Sept. 10 where the economy will likely be a key focus.

item.title: Salesforce shares at risk of longest losing streak in nine-plus years
Bolt CEO: Department stores are rising from the ashes
item.description: To write off department stores entirely would be premature. These institutions have weathered economic storms before.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: JetBlue, Hewlett Packard Enterprise and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading Thursday.

item.title: Oil prices climb on report that OPEC+ will delay its planned output boost
A musician siphoned $10 million in royalties after using AI to create hundreds of thousands of songs, streaming them billions of times
item.description: Michael Smith, 52, of Cornelius, North Carolina, was arrested on fraud and conspiracy charges. He faces up to 60 years in prison.

item.title: This ETF's 2024 gains nearly match the Nasdaq Composite — with less volatility
item.description: This exchange-traded fund could be a suitable candidate to ride out growing volatility on Wall Street.

item.title: There’s a yen-carry-trade angle to the Mexican peso’s recent tumble
Mars chief reveals his secrets to leadership success: Slow down, learn from failures, embrace feedback
item.description: Anton Vincent, president of Mars North America, underscored the value of constructive feedback in shaping a career.

item.title: OPEC+ members delay plans to hike production by two months after oil price slump
item.description: The increases were part of a plan to gradually return a broader 2.2 million barrels per day of supply to the market over the following months.

item.title: U.S. productivity rate called ‘envy of the world’ after second-quarter revision
